comments.body: Unions are ideal for this situation: `message: Buffer | string`.
What kind of function is `callback`? Can you be more specific?

So these were all copied verbatim from the [mqtt definition](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/3abf7a7bd48328caa63a30c0b26467f8c17bff12/mqtt/mqtt.d.ts#L191-L200) since aws-iot-device-sdk marshals them straight through. I initially only wanted to make sure that they match exactly but I could certainly figure out what that callback is and then contribute it to mqtt after. I'll give it a shot
